song.title: The Lady of Mars
song.info:
The music has been made for the NES / FamiCom / Pegasus game-consoles.
They contains Ricoh 2A03 soundchip with 5 channels of sound: - two pulse channels, - one triangle channel, - one noise channel and - one DPCM (sample) channel.
This is my very first song for the NES. :)
The full album "DEATH SQUAD" with this song - is here: http://yerzmyey.i-demo.pl/
